commit message:
Update strings.xml

BEFORE: Quote → Cuota
AFTER: Quote → Citar

Update arrays.xml

This is a modification of the arrays.xml for the spanish translation, some words were very bad written (like 'mensage' instead of 'mensaje').

Merge pull request #98 from moshpirit/patch-1

Update strings.xml

Merge pull request #99 from moshpirit/patch-2

Update arrays.xml

Updated German translation

Merged existing, outdated version with strings from English original.
Translated further on.

Merge pull request #100 from vinzv/master

Updated German translation

Update strings.xml

· BEFORE:
<string name='menu_item_user_messages'>Mensajes para '%1s'</string>
(It means something like: Messages to '%1s')


· AFTER:
<string name='menu_item_user_messages'>Mensajes de '%1s'</string>
(It means something like: Messages by '%1s')

Merge pull request #101 from moshpirit/patch-3

menu_item_user_messages

Icon changes

* added hdpi/mdpi/xhdpi/xxhdpi icons from original Android iconset
* changed existing icons according to original Android iconset (needs
testing/review!)

fixes andstatus/andstatus#106

Merge pull request #110 from vinzv/master

Icon changes

Different avatar for the Light scheme. Two additional higher resolution
images for the Default avatar
Fixed task 106: Change icons
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/106

Fixed #112: Share from one account to another
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/112

Added tests for #112 it fixed it: Share from one account to another
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/112
Fixed: No Account name in message editor when sending account is not current account
Started implementation of  #97 enhancement: option to open notice URL in browser

Implemented #97: Option to open notice URL in browser
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/97
Added 'ENTER sends message' option
Fixed Twitter Microblogging system not 'manageable'
Fixed: Name of a command depends on Microblogging System (Origin)

Fixed #67: Reverse sorting of messages in thread view (as an option)
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/67

Fixed #65: Loading new content after a messages was posted
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/65

Fixed #15: 'Blog' term changed to 'Post'
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/15

Implemented #108: Optional background color for replies
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/108
Cleaning, changelog updated
HTML markup is stripped from HTML-formatted message on 'Share'

HTML to plain text conversion preserves line breaks at

and
From HTML conversion simplified and unified
Fixed HTML-ify message to be posted to Pump.io

Description updated based on this discussion:
https://loadaverage.org/conversation/2470423

Implemented #108: Only replies to 'myself' (to one of User's accounts)
are marked
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/108
#108: Language strings and changelog updated
Share feature shares HTML content also #112. Refactoring.

Pressing ENTER key while editing post inserts newline at current
position, not at the end as before.
Documentation updated

Fixed #92: Cannot add new Twitter account for Android before 4.2 (before
API 17). Fixed several incompatibilities with Android API < 16
http://github.com/andstatus/andstatus/issues/issue/92
